game.name: Pub Encounter
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Pub Encounter" is a romance game where you can fall in love with one of several middle-aged men.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Pub Encounter" is a romance game where you can fall in love with one of several middle-aged men.

reviewHighlights.text: 마모루 하나보고 질렀는데 두고두고 환상에 빠지게 만듬 진짜ㅠ너무ㅠㅠ사랑한다 최고의 게임이였다 나에겐..
